--- In gladiator@egroups.com, "Ricky Der" <TheLegendaryLight@w...> 
wrote:
>   Don't you think that if we make lvs that have alot of money + exp 
in it,
> and we make characters that make superman look like a flea, and we 
reach our
> maximum, do you think we will still have sccenario challenges after 
our
> characters can tear through anything?  It's a silly question, but i 
always
> look toward the future.  Plus it can help me with my lvs
> 
>                                                         Ricky Der, 
The
> Legendary Light
Hmm.  I beg to differ about reaching maximums.  It took me 3 or 4 
hours to raise the money to buy a certain mage.  That certain mage
was 
converted into an archmage.  That archmage was able to defeat my 
extreme level.  But, the point is to buy the next level of experience 
would take me 30+ minutes to raise the funds.

It will be nearly impossible (IMHO) to create enough  legitimate 
episodes to reach the maximum amount of experience.  I estimate that 
one would need at least 1,000 scenarios, to approach the  experience 
level of my illegitimate archmage.  His experience level is beyond 
300.  But the rest of his characeristics are beyond 1000.  It cost 
roughly $250,000,000+ for him.

Well, I am on this subject of super levels.  Does anyone have a 100% 
legitimate team that has not been through either the tevfifty or Tryx 
chronicles?  I would like someone to verify the levels I am creating 
are not too hard if one went straight from the original gladiator 
scenarios into the ones I am creating.  Unfortunately, my only 100% 
legitimate team has crossed through any scenarios yet.  I am still 
working on my 1st easier one, but it will take time to play through 
it.
